import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Jumbotron, Button, Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Home = () => { return (

Welcome to Recipe App

Here you can create, browse and manage your favorite recipes.

About Us

We are a team of passionate food lovers who believe that cooking and eating delicious food is one of life's greatest pleasures. Our mission is to make it easy for everyone to discover and share their favorite recipes.

Get Started

If you're new to Recipe App, the first step is to create an account. Once you've logged in, you can start creating and saving your own recipes, as well as browsing and trying out other people's recipes.

); }; export default Home;
